title: A few very nice 1911 Obaks available
author: Archive

posts.post_title: A few very nice 1911 Obaks available
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen

All three cards are very nice.  If anything, there are only mild touches to some of the corners.  No significant wear or any creasing can be found.  All solid cards for a midgrade Obak set.  Prices below include shipping and scans are available upon request.

O'Rourke PSA 3 - $100
Lamline PSA 4 - $150
Dillon PSA 4 - $150

Thanks in advance,
Brian
